participant_1.background:
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
I'm single and happy, and I spend my free time writing short films.
i am in art school.
My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together.
i have lived a very sheltered life.

participant_2.background:
I've had to give up a lot of my friends to pursue my dream of filmmaking.
My musical tastes will make me more relatable to my co-workers at the bank.
i love to eat meat.
I play disc golf because it's a good way to get exercise and spend time outdoors with my collie.
I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing alright, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just in between projects right now, so I'm enjoying some free time.
That sounds nice! I'm actually working on a project right now, but I'm taking a break to chat with you.
What kind of project are you working on?
I'm making a short film about my family.
Oh, that sounds really cool! I love short films.
Thanks! I'm hoping to make it into a festival.
I'm sure you will! What kind of music do you like?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm really into indie rock right now.
Oh, I love indie rock too! What bands do you like?
I really like The Strokes, The Killers, and The National.
I love all of those bands! They're so good.
Me too! I'm glad you like them.
I'm also a big fan of film. I love watching movies and writing short films.
That's awesome! I love watching movies too.
Do you have a favorite movie?
I have a lot of favorite movies, but I think my favorite is probably The Shawshank Redemption.
That's a great movie! I love it too
